title: Egypt national football team
summary: The Egypt national football team (Arabic: منتخب مصر لكرة القدم‎), known colloquially as "the Pharaohs", represents in men's international football, and is governed by the Egyptian Football Association (EFA), the governing body of football in Egypt. The team's historical stadium is Cairo International Stadium, although matches are sometimes played at Borg El Arab Stadium in Alexandria.
